attributes.title: Introduction to Python Programming
attributes.description: A comprehensive introduction to Python programming covering basic syntax, data types, control structures, and functions. This module combines video tutorials, text-based exercises, and interactive coding challenges.

attributes.title: Data Structures and Algorithms
attributes.description: Learn fundamental data structures (arrays, linked lists, trees, graphs) and algorithms (sorting, searching, dynamic programming) through comprehensive video lectures and visual demonstrations.

attributes.title: Web Development Fundamentals
attributes.description: Master the basics of web development including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and responsive design principles. Includes hands-on projects and real-world examples.

attributes.title: Database Design Principles
attributes.description: Comprehensive text-based guide covering relational database design, normalization, SQL queries, and database optimization techniques. Includes detailed examples and practice exercises.

attributes.title: Machine Learning Fundamentals
attributes.description: Audio-based learning module covering the theoretical foundations of machine learning, including supervised and unsupervised learning, neural networks, and model evaluation techniques.

attributes.title: DevOps and Cloud Computing
attributes.description: Learn modern DevOps practices and cloud computing concepts through a combination of video demonstrations, text documentation, and hands-on lab exercises covering Docker, Kubernetes, and AWS.
